statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_currency_transfers ORDER BY transfer_id DESC;
SELECT transfer_id, amount, transfer_date FROM virtual_currency_transfers WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT from_wallet_id, to_wallet_id, amount FROM virtual_currency_transfers WHERE transfer_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM virtual_currency_transfers WHERE from_wallet_id = 123 OR to_wallet_id = 456;
SELECT transfer_id, amount FROM virtual_currency_transfers ORDER BY amount DESC, transfer_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_currency_transfers WHERE transfer_id = 1;
SELECT from_wallet_id, to_wallet_id, amount FROM virtual_currency_transfers WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transfer_id, from_wallet_id, transfer_date FROM virtual_currency_transfers WHERE transfer_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM virtual_currency_transfers WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT transfer_id, from_wallet_id, to_wallet_id, amount, transfer_date FROM virtual_currency_transfers WHERE from_wallet_id = 2 ORDER BY transfer_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount < 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'T%'
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username FROM users WHERE balance > 100.00 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM users WHERE balance < 0
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT currency, balance FROM wallets WHERE wallet_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, wallet_id, currency, balance FROM users JOIN wallets ON users.user_id = wallets.user_id WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT user_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallets GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Wallets WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT wallet_id, balance, currency_type FROM Wallets WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(wallet_id) AS wallet_count FROM Wallets GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, w.currency_type FROM Transactions t JOIN Wallets w ON t.from_wallet = w.wallet_id;
SELECT * FROM Wallets WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC, wallet_id ASC
SELECT user_id, currency_type, balance FROM Wallets INNER JOIN Users ON Wallets.user_id = Users.user_id
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, w.currency_type FROM Transactions t INNER JOIN Wallets w ON t.from_wallet = w.wallet_id WHERE t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC
SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Transactions t ON u.user_id = t.from_wallet GROUP BY u.user_id HAVING num_transactions > 5

SELECT c.currency_type, c.description, SUM(w.balance) AS total_balance FROM CurrencyTypes c LEFT JOIN Wallets w ON c.currency_type = w.currency_type GROUP BY c.currency_type ORDER BY total_balance DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE wallet_balance > 100;
SELECT wallet_name, balance FROM wallets ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT wallet_id, currency_id FROM wallet_currency WHERE currency_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'John';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE wallet_balance > 1000;
SELECT wallet_name, balance FROM wallets WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT currency_name FROM currency_types WHERE currency_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
